page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN EYAM.
page.content: From April 1985 to July 1985 we wrote for the Domesday Project about the people with jobs in Eyam. We gave out a number of questionnaires to villagers asking about the work they did and where they worked.We selected about one third of the houses in the village. Here are our results- {TYPE OF EMPLOYMENT Armed forces--2% Engineering--20% Proffessional--18% Quarry-Mining-Mills--14% Service--24% Skilled--8% Housework--6% Other work--8% {PLACES OF WORK Eyam area--46% Sheffield--12% Bakewell--10% Chesterfield--4%
